main event: A UFO sighting occurred on April 15, 1965, in Durand, Illinois.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for about 5 to 8 seconds,The object was described as dropping straight down and emitting flashes of light,The observer initially thought it was a meteor before realizing it was something else,The witness expressed a newfound belief in extraterrestrial life after the sighting,This case was reportedly used in an RFD Documentary.
sighted object: unidentified flying object emitting flashes of light
witness description: A civilian who reported the sighting and described the object's behavior and appearance.
